II.i.2.D
.6.b
.
Use of VA Form 20-10206
VA Form 20-10206, Freedom of Information Act (FOIA) or Privacy Act (PA) Request
, is available for a claimant, a claimant’s authorized third-party representative, a claimant’s authorized POA, or other individual to use to request records.
Important
:  Use of this form is not a requirement but is encouraged as the preferred method to request records under FOIA or PA.
title: M21-1, Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Handling Specific Types of Mail
citation: Part II, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
